Special Powers
NO MORE THORS: When Donald Blake makes a close attack, his targets can't use defense powers.

odinson51303
Had the misfortune of playing against this monster this weekend.. his trait combined with quake was devastating. He really didn't need to make use of his 3 targets. He was teamed with lower start line blackheart.... free running shot or charge made it my most embarrassing loss ever, and I've been playing on and off since 2003.... been out for a couple years, and this is what I get on my return......going to have to rub some dirt on it and shake it off.... if executed correctly, he's a problem.. well played to my opponent

I get you on the old figs wording vs latest ones. No matter how clear WizKids thinks they've made it, there are always gray areas. in this case you played it right. Can't use defense powers covers stop clicks.

Can't be ignored stopped being a thing along with can't be countered. We now Have SAFEGUARD: Outwit/Pulse Wave and PROTECTED: Outwit/Pulse Wave. And No More Thors get through all of that (when it comes to Defense Powers).

You know what you are right, it reads differently, this one is on attack not on hit. So yes, it will bypass all def powers. This make him much better and his quake far more deadly.
January 18, 2022
OldTallandUgly
I think you may be wrong @Goop. This trait activates on making the attack, not on hit, which was green arrow’s effect. This works like Surtur’s power. Not even Stop clicks on the defense slot are safe.
January 18, 2022
Goop
Before you get too excited remember that this power only really works on reducers. It doesn't get past stuff before the hit happens like Super Senses, Mastermind, Combat Reflexes etc (Chase Green Arrow Ruling). So he basically has a penetrating quake which is great but not really worth the 90pts he costs. Hopefully he gets errattaed to "until end of turn". That would make him WAY better.
